trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There were no other sightings in Boca Raton on or around June 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsA diamond shaped object making no noise headed West after sundown on Saturday June 18th, 2011. The object had what appeared to be a flame emitting from the center of it. There were no other lights and I could only make out the shape of the outline due to the shimmering from the center. I was with my boss and his wife on their front driveway, it appeared to be descending as it headed West, possibly due to damage to the craft, hence the fire. We were directly East of the Florida everglades so the object headed into a sparsely populated area.
